ygData.subject: Re: [EQ_Tinkering] gem cutter
ygData.msgSnippet: I thought it was decided that this was not the use for the gemcutter.  Are you sure thats what it will do? -Cogg- ... From:  To:
ygData.messageBody:
I thought it was decided that this was not the use for the gemcutter. Are
you sure thats what it will do?

-Cogg-

----- Original Message -----
From: <pf1701d@...>
To: <EQ_Tinkering@egroups.com>
Sent: Saturday, August 26, 2000 9:03 AM
Subject: [EQ_Tinkering] gem cutter


> I found the following description of the gemcutter at eqmaps.com. In your
> collective wisdom is this correct?
>
> link: http://eqmaps.com/zone.php3?tag=norrath&item=2511
>
> This item can be created by gnomish tinkers. Combine the following items
in a
> Toolbox to create the gemcutter. This item will become trivial to make at
> skill 104.
>
>
> Metal Rod
> Diamon Dust
> Standard Bow Cam
> Metal Fastening
> Firewater
> Grease
>
> This is a great tool for all those jewelry makers out there. It will
increase
> the quality of gems which in turn will reduce the chance of failure when
> using these "upgraded" gems. All you have to do is pick up a gem, and then
> right click on the gemcutter, you will be returned with a high quality
gem.
>
> OOPS sorry about the forst post
>
>
>
>
>
